strong.class: hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl pull-left site_sub_title
text-center visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl site_sub_title

div.h3: UIL District Cross X Debate Champs
First division twirling solo qualified for STATE!

div.p:
Per Governor Abbott's order Munday CISD will remain closed until at least May 4th, 2020. We will continue to serve meals and provide educational materials to our students. Please contact your child's campus or the administration office if you need assistance.
Troy Parton, Superintendent

Protecting the Privacy of K-12 Students We are particularly committed to protecting the privacy of our K-12 users. We have a special policy that describes how Zoom handles personal data of K-12 students using Zoom through their schools, which are signing up for Zoom services for their students.

Per Governor Abbott's order Munday CISD will remain closed until at least May 4th, 2020. We will continue to serve meals and provide educational materials to our students. Please contact your child's campus or the administration office if you need assistance.
Troy Parton, Superintendent

Protecting the Privacy of K-12 Students We are particularly committed to protecting the privacy of our K-12 users. We have a special policy that describes how Zoom handles personal data of K-12 students using Zoom through their schools, which are signing up for Zoom services for their students.
